keepConnect.name: Aw ka to jɛɲɔgɔnya la .
keepConnect.helperText: Ni i ye daminɛ yɔrɔ digi, o tuma na, i ka yɔrɔ digi. O b’a ɲini ka jateminɛ kɛ ko jɛgɛnsira bɛna segin ka don ɲɔgɔn na tuma bɛɛ a tigɛlen kɔfɛ.

url.name: URL .
url.helperText: Link URL, misali la ws://192.168.0.2:7001, walima wws://example.com/path
url.error: URL ɲuman ye URL ye min bɛ daminɛ ni ws:// walima wws:// ye .

status.waitRetry: A bɛ makɔnɔni na ka ɲɛsin ɲɔgɔndan ma...
